actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-301.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of (S. 1193).  A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982 and 1983 for the Department of State, the International Communication Agency, and the Board for International Broadcasting, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 1193 (Dept. of State funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of (S. 1193).  A bill to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1982 and 1983 for the Department of State, the International Communication Agency, and the Board for International Broadcasting, and for other purposes.
